articles.author: Phil Rosen
articles.title: Welcome to the Dollar war: a global fight over America's economic dominance - Business Insider
articles.description: The dominance of the US dollar is slipping — and this global currency fight will determine whether America can stay on top of the world economy.
articles.content:
The US dollar isn't just for Americans every country in the world relies on it.
The greenback has been facilitating the flow of money and goods around the world for over a century. Buying or selling… [+15758 chars]
